text: $(br)$(#bd951a)You can choose a Plant and a Zombie for the next update!
$(br)$(#bd951a)Gives you access to early access builds of the mod before they go public!
$(br2)$()$(#ff0000)Smuggy (Bananasaurus Rex, Zom-Blob, Dogwood, Hawker Cart & Zombie Piggy, Super Chomper, Octo Zombie, Fire-Shroom, Cursed Gargolith)
$(br)$()$(#ff0000)Parker (Chester Chomper, Foot Soldier, Night Cap, Z-Mech, Vampire Flower, Hover Goat-3000)
$(br2)$()$(#ff0000)FlareRi (Princess Spring Grass, Bass Zombie, Banana Dancer, Unicorn Gargantuar & Rainbow Bass Imp, Impatiens Shooter, 80's Action Hero)
